title: [Dancer in the dark review : The Movie Show]
brief_description: This review by ‘The Movie Show’ hosts Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton is one of the more fiery exchanges between the two reviewers. Lars von Trier’s “grim musical” ‘Dancer in the Dark’ is the film under the microscope, inspiring wildly different perspectives from Margaret and David.
